instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3299 - Black screen, no image on External screen or display
threads.message:
Hey guys, 

I have this 820-3299 (IMAC) and it came in for no image, do these boards have the gpu issues as well, i want to avoid spending great amounts of time trying to repair it. 

thank you guys in advance,

threads.title: 820-3299 - Black screen, no image on External screen or display
820-3299 - Black screen, no image on External screen or display
threads.message: GPU issues are very rare on these. Do a PRAM reset and see if it chimes too.
